translations.english: In the ninth month, Dai prime minister Chen Xi rebelled.

translations.chinese: 上曰：「豨嘗為吾使，甚有信。
translations.english: The emperor said: "Xi once served as my envoy and was very trustworthy.

translations.chinese: 代地吾所急，故封豨為列侯，以相國守代，今乃與 王黃等劫掠代地！
translations.english: Dai territory is what I consider urgent, so I enfeoffed Xi as a marquis to guard Dai as prime minister. Now he joins with Wang Huang and others to plunder Dai territory!

translations.chinese: 吏民非有罪也，能去豨、黃來歸者，皆赦之。」
translations.english: Officials and people have no crime. Those who can leave Xi and Huang and return will all be pardoned."
The emperor went east himself and arrived at Handan.
